Dear Dear..i'm back at last..hee..i was so sad today cos SOMEONE promise to send me off but HE din't..Haiz..WHY?? but at least yonghwan dey all got send me off..hee..Gonna meet some of my frens soon to pass dem something dey wanted..-SHINHWA AUTOGRAPH-..haha..Gals HAPPY le ma..LOLx..the most happy in this trip was i got a chance to go to somewhere i wanna go ever still THEY change company!and i have a wonderful dinner with RIC & JIN..but actually got 6ppl that will meet for that dinner wan but end up only RIC & JIN..but at least can see Ric i'm very happy le..haha.. lastly i wanna tell RIC, JIN & Frens that are with me at the trip.. EVERYDAY`EVERYNIGHT`I'M MISSING YOU`YOU`YOU`YOU`YOU *MUCKS* ok..gtg..tell u gals other stuff wad i have done der..881.. p/s: if u gals knows WHO i'm toking abt pls dun tell others orh..hehe..thanks
